content.name: Basic Package
details: 1 GB disk space and 10 GB bandwidth, ideal for small personal websites.
User-friendly control panel for easy management.
Free SSL certificate for secure connections.
24/7 customer support via chat and email.

content.name: Standard Package
details: 5 GB disk space and 50 GB bandwidth, suitable for small businesses.
Automatic daily backups to ensure data safety.
Support for popular CMS like WordPress and Joomla.
Email hosting with customizable email accounts.

content.name: Advanced Package
details: 10 GB disk space and 100 GB bandwidth for growing websites.
Enhanced security features including malware scanning.
Easy one-click installation for various applications.
Staging environments for safe website updates.

content.name: Premium Package
details: Unlimited disk space and bandwidth for high-traffic sites.
Priority support with faster response times.
Advanced caching solutions for improved website performance.
Ability to host multiple domains under a single account.

content.name: Basic Package
details: 1 CPU core and 1 GB RAM, perfect for small to medium applications.
Scalable resources to accommodate growing websites.
Full root access for custom configurations.
SSD storage for faster data access and performance.

content.name: Standard Package
details: 2 CPU cores and 2 GB RAM, ideal for moderate traffic websites.
Flexible scaling options for increased resource needs.
Managed security features including firewalls and backups.
24/7 customer support to assist with technical issues.

content.name: Advanced Package
details: 4 CPU cores and 4 GB RAM, suitable for resource-intensive applications.
Enhanced performance with dedicated IP addresses.
Customizable software installations to meet specific needs.
Weekly backups to ensure data safety and recovery.

content.name: Premium Package
details: 8 CPU cores and 8 GB RAM for high-performance demands.
Optimized resource allocation for maximum uptime.
Full management service including updates and monitoring.
Advanced security protocols and DDoS protection.

content.name: Basic Package
details: Single dedicated server with 4 CPU cores and 8 GB RAM.
Ideal for large websites and applications with high traffic.
Managed support included for software updates and security.
High bandwidth allowance for better performance.

content.name: Standard Package
details: Dedicated server with 6 CPU cores and 16 GB RAM.
Enhanced hardware resources for more demanding applications.
24/7 monitoring and support for guaranteed uptime.
Free migration service to switch from your current host.

content.name: Advanced Package
details: Dedicated server with 8 CPU cores and 32 GB RAM.
Robust infrastructure for enterprise-level applications.
Custom server configurations tailored to your needs.
Comprehensive security measures including SSL certificates.

content.name: Premium Package
details: High-performance server with 12 CPU cores and 64 GB RAM.
Designed for heavy-duty workloads and maximum efficiency.
Full management options including server backups and updates.
Advanced DDoS protection to safeguard your website.

content.name: Basic Package
details: 10 GB storage and 100 GB bandwidth for small client bases.
Ability to create custom hosting plans for clients.
White-label hosting to build your own brand.
User-friendly control panel for easy management.

content.name: Standard Package
details: 20 GB storage and 200 GB bandwidth, suitable for growing businesses.
Advanced management tools for better client handling.
Free website migration service for new clients.
Technical support for your clients included.

content.name: Advanced Package
details: 40 GB storage and 400 GB bandwidth for larger client portfolios.
Dedicated IP addresses available for each client account.
Customizable WHMCS billing software for client management.
Regular updates and security patches provided.

content.name: Premium Package
details: 80 GB storage and 800 GB bandwidth for high-demand users.
Priority support for reseller accounts.
Ability to resell additional services like domain registration.
Comprehensive analytics tools to monitor client usage.
